column1: The Pit Room////I was hungry and decided to go somewhere I haven't tried
column2: we agreed on the pit room
column4: we ordered we ordered 3 meat and frito pie. The chili has no favor and the chopped beef was Luke warm. There wasn't any place to sit so the say you can go outside under there heating lamps to eat
column5: keep in mind today's weather is 47 degrees
column6: I wasn't please with the food but it's edible and like I started out saying
column7: I was hungry. I ate enough to stop my hunger pains
